```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggiraphExtra)
library(GGally)

```


```{r}

diamonds_raw <- read_csv("data/diamonds.csv")

glimpse(diamonds_raw)

```


```{r}

summary(diamonds_raw)



```


```{r}

ggpairs(diamonds_raw)



```


```{r}

diamonds1 <- diamonds_raw %>%
  select(-c(x, y, z))


```


```{r}

ggpairs(diamonds1)


```


```{r}

diamonds1 %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = carat, y = price) +
  geom_point()


```


```{r}

plot(lm(diamonds1$price ~ diamonds1$carat))

```
